description: Try our easy to follow Beverly's Mango Mousse recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Beverly's Mango Mousse Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Slice the remaining mango and arrange on the set mousse. Top with passionfruit pulp and refrigerate until serving.
